Interface Guardian

extends Aquatic, Monster

    • Method Detail

      • isElder

        boolean isElder()
        Checks if this guardian is an elder or not.

        Elder guardians may have higher health, attack damage, and other drop items.

        Returns:
        True if this is an elder guardian

      • setElder

        void setElder(boolean elder)
        Sets whether this guardian is an elder.

        Elder guardians may have higher health, attack damage, and other item drops.

        Parameters:
        elder - Whether this guardian is an elder or not
